snippet.title: Bloodborne Kart: Hunter's Dream Course
snippet.description:
Music by the Noble Demon: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wn5tVGRL3Mw
Follow on Twitter for daily updates: https://twitter.com/b0tster

Finally, a new track! This track is by far the longest, taking inspiration from MK's rainbow road. There are also some new additions to the game worth mentioning.

➡ AI has been improved! They are still prone to some small navigation bugs, but now they will pick a more efficient path down the track and perform tricks off of ramps to gain quicksilver bullets.

➡ Now that there are multiple racers and karts to choose from, the AI racers are now customizable before each race, meaning that you can have an even distribution like the default, or you can make them all Gehrman clones!

➡ On top of that, theres 'power up customization', inspired by smash brothers. With this, you can 'ban' certain power ups from being obtained or turn off power ups entirely!

Thanks for checking out the vid! Will see you next time!
